Posts.Content: Sue, 29, was diagnosed in March 04 when 8 months pregnant with 2nd child. Induced the next day, had mastectomy a week and a half later. Node was negative, clean margins. Did chemo for 3 months (AC) had tumor marker test Aug 30th, ca2729 was at 56. Had a pet scan on Sept 1st, cat scan on the 2nd, and they think the cancer has gone into the nodes between my lungs. Going for a second opinion next week. ca2729 was at 68 on Sept 6th. If anyone has a similar story, let me know.
Posts.Title: ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share
